General.Name: LESS S.A.
General.Description: Less S.A. operates in e-commerce sector. It also engages in purchase and sale of second-hand items, including used clothing, electronics, sports equipment, books, and toys. In addition, the company sells electric bicycles and accessories for electric bicycles in the form of charging stations, as well as management of the portal, application, and the LESS brand. Further, it provides business and management consultancy, as well as financial reporting and bookkeeping services. The company offers its products both online and offline. The company was formerly known as Groclin S.A. and changed its name to Less S.A. in August 2022. Less S.A. was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Grodzisk Wielkopolski, Poland.
